original: Lokuttare sote paṭihaññati no lokiye, lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti no lokiyena, sāvakā paṭivijānanti no puthujjanāti?
analyzed: lokuttare sote paṭihaññati no lokiye lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti no lokiyena sāvakā paṭivijānanti no puthujjana ati

original: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti?
analyzed: nanu buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāraḥ lokiye sote paṭihaññati iti

original: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāraḥ lokiye sote paṭihaññati no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānantīti?
analyzed: nanu buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti iti

original: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ puthujjanā paṭivijānantīti?
analyzed: nanu buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram puthujjanāḥ paṭivijānanti iti

original: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram puthujjanāḥ paṭivijānanti no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Maggo phalaṁ nibbānaṁ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ,
analyzed: maggo phalam nibbāna sotāpatti maggo sotāpatti phala sakadāgāmi maggo sakadāgāmi phala

original: anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṁ, satipaṭṭhānaṁ sammappadhānaṁ
analyzed: anāgāmi maggaḥ anāgāmi phala arahatta maggaḥ arahatta phala sati paṭṭhānam sammappadhāna

original: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇantīti?
analyzed: atthi keci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram suṇanti iti

original: Lokuttaro dhammo sotaviññeyyo, sotasmiṁ paṭihaññati, sotassa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ dhammo sota viññeyyaḥ sotasmim paṭihaññati sotassa āpātham āgacchati iti

original: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṁ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
analyzed: nanu lokuttaraḥ dhammo na sota viññeyyaḥ na sotasmim paṭihaññati na sotassa āpātham āgacchati iti

original: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṁ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṁ āgacchati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na sota viññeyyaḥ na sotasmim paṭihaññati na sotassa āpātham āgacchati no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre rajjeyyunti?
analyzed: atthi keci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāre rajjeyyun ti

original: Lokuttaro dhammo rāgaṭṭhāniyo rajanīyo kamanīyo madanīyo bandhanīyo mucchanīyoti?
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ rāga ṭṭhāniyaḥ rajanīyaḥ kamanīyaḥ madanīyaḥ bandhanīyaḥ mucchanīyaḥ iti

original: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyoti?
analyzed: nanu lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na rāga ṭṭhāniyaḥ na rajanīyaḥ na kamanīyaḥ na madanīyaḥ na bandhanīyaḥ na mucchanīyaḥ iti

original: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na rāga ṭṭhāniyaḥ na rajanīyaḥ na kamanīyaḥ na madanīyaḥ na bandhanīyaḥ na mucchanīyaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre dusseyyunti?
analyzed: atthi keci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāre dusseyyunti
lokuttaraḥ dhammo dosa ṭṭhāniyo kopa ṭṭhāniyo paṭigha ṭṭhāniyo ti

original: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyoti?
analyzed: nanu lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na dosa ṭhāniyaḥ na kopa ṭhāniyaḥ na paṭigha ṭṭhāniyaḥ ti

original: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na dosa ṭhāniyaḥ na kopa ṭṭhāniyaḥ na paṭigha ṭṭhāniyaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre muyheyyunti?
analyzed: atthi keci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāre muyheyyun ti

original: Lokuttaro dhammo mohaṭṭhāniyo aññāṇakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattanikoti?
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ moha ṭṭhāniyaḥ aññāṇa karaṇaḥ acakkhukaraṇaḥ paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ ti

original: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattanikoti?
analyzed: nanu lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na moha ṭṭhāniyaḥ na aññāṇa karaṇaḥ na acakkhukaraṇaḥ paññā vuddhikaḥ avighāta pakkhiko nibbāna savattanikaḥ ti

original: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ na moha ṭṭhāniyaḥ na aññāṇa karaṇaḥ na acakkhu karaṇaḥ paññā vuddhikaḥ avighāta pakkhiko nibbāna savattanikaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti?
analyzed: ye keci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram suṇanti sabbe te maggam bhāventi iti

original: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti?
analyzed: ye keci buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram suṇanti sabbe te maggam bhāventi iti

original: Bālaputhujjanā buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇanti, bālaputhujjanā maggaṁ bhāventīti?
analyzed: bāla puthujjanāḥ buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram suṇanti bāla puthujjanāḥ maggam bhāventi iti

original: saṅghabhedako buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṁ suṇāti, saṅghabhedako maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: saṅgha bhedakaḥ buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāram suṇāti saṅgha bhedakaḥ maggam bhāveti iti

original: Labbhā sovaṇṇamayāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?
analyzed: labbhā sovaṇṇa mayāya laṭṭhiyā dhañña puñjaḥ api suvaṇṇa puñjaḥ api ācikkhitunti

original: Evamevaṁ bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharatīti.
analyzed: evam evam bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena lokiyam pi lokuttaram pi dhammam voharati iti

original: Labbhā elaṇḍiyāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?
analyzed: labbhā elaṇḍiyāya laṭṭhiyā dhañña puñjaḥ api suvaṇṇa puñjaḥ api ācikkhitunti

original: Evamevaṁ bhagavā lokiyena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharatīti.
analyzed: evam evam bhagavā lokiyena vohārena lokiyam pi lokuttaram pi dhammam voharati iti

original: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?
analyzed: buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāraḥ lokiyam voharantassa lokiyaḥ hoti lokuttaram voharantassa lokuttaro hoti iti

original: Lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiye sote paṭihaññati, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttare sote paṭihaññati;
analyzed: lokiyam voharantassa lokiye sote paṭihaññati lokuttaram voharantassa lokuttare sote paṭihaññati

original: lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti;
analyzed: lokiyam voharantassa lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti lokuttaram voharantassa lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti

original: lokiyaṁ voharantassa puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa sāvakā paṭivijānantīti?
analyzed: lokiyam voharantassa puthujjanā paṭivijānanti lokuttaram voharantassa sāvakā paṭivijānanti iti

original: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti?
analyzed: buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāraḥ lokiyam voharantassa lokiyaḥ hoti lokuttaram voharantassa lokuttaro hoti iti

original: Nanu bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharatīti?
analyzed: nanu bhagavā lokiyam pi lokuttaram pi dhammam voharati iti

original: Hañci bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṁ voharati, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci bhagavā lokiyam pi lokuttaram pi dhammam voharati tena vata re vattabbe

original: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti.
analyzed: buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāraḥ lokiyam voharantassa lokiyaḥ hoti lokuttaram voharantassa lokuttaro hoti iti

original: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṁ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?
analyzed: buddhassa bhagavataḥ vohāraḥ lokiyam voharantassa lokiyaḥ hoti lokuttaram voharantassa lokuttaro hoti iti

original: Maggaṁ voharantassa maggo hoti, amaggaṁ voharantassa amaggo hoti, phalaṁ voharantassa
analyzed: maggam voharantassa maggaḥ hoti amaggam voharantassa amaggaḥ hoti phalam voharantassa

original: phalaṁ hoti, aphalaṁ voharantassa aphalaṁ hoti, nibbānaṁ voharantassa nibbānaṁ hoti,
analyzed: phalam hoti aphalam voharantassa aphalam hoti nibbānam voharantassa nibbānam hoti

original: anibbānaṁ voharantassa anibbānaṁ hoti, saṅkhataṁ voharantassa saṅkhataṁ hoti, asaṅkhataṁ
analyzed: anibbānam voharantassa anibbānam hoti saṅkhatam voharantassa saṅkhatam hoti a saṅkhata

original: voharantassa asaṅkhataṁ hoti, rūpaṁ voharantassa rūpaṁ hoti, arūpaṁ voharantassa
analyzed: voharantassa asaṅkhatam hoti rūpam voharantassa rūpam hoti arūpam voharantassa

original: arūpaṁ hoti, vedanaṁ voharantassa vedanā hoti, avedanaṁ voharantassa avedanā hoti,
analyzed: arūpam hoti vedanam voharantassa vedanā hoti a vedanam voharantassa a vedanā hoti

original: saññaṁ voharantassa saññā hoti, asaññaṁ voharantassa asaññā hoti, saṅkhāre voharantassa
analyzed: saññam voharantassa saññā hoti asaññam voharantassa asaññā hoti saṅkhāre voharantassa

original: saṅkhārā honti, asaṅkhāre voharantassa asaṅkhārā honti, viññāṇaṁ voharantassa viññāṇaṁ
analyzed: saṅkhārāḥ honti asaṅkhāre voharantassa asaṅkhārāḥ honti viññāṇam voharantassa viññāṇa
hoti aviññāṇam voharantassa aviññāṇam hoti iti
